ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId), OR( PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId) = '0121v000000z1JdAAI', PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId) = '0121v000000z1JTAAY' ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Sales' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Record type cannot be changed from Agency to Sales. Please contact salesforce admin team
